00038 
00039 InputFileDevice::InputFileDevice(
00040         const char* const STR_FileName,
00041         OutputDevice& CLI_Output,
00042         const bool B_AutoDelete)
00043   : IODevice(tk::String::Concat(MAX_DEVICE_NAME_LENGTH, "input-file[", STR_FileName, "]"), "\n", B_AutoDelete),
00044     m_strFileName(MAX_FILE_PATH_LENGTH, STR_FileName), m_pfFile(NULL),
00045     m_cliOutput(CLI_Output),
00046     m_iCurrentLine(0), m_iCurrentColumn(0), m_iNextLine(1), m_iNextColumn(1)
00047 {
00048     EnsureCommonDevices();
00049 
00050     m_cliOutput.UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00051 }
00052 
00053 InputFileDevice::~InputFileDevice(void)
00054 {
00055     m_cliOutput.FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00056 }
00057 
00058 const bool InputFileDevice::OpenDevice(void)
00059 {
00060     CLI_ASSERT(& m_cliOutput != this);
00061     if (! m_cliOutput.OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00062     {
00063         return false;
00064     }
00065 
00066     if (m_pfFile == NULL)
00067     {
00068         m_pfFile = fopen(m_strFileName, "r");
00069     }
00070 
00071     return (m_pfFile != NULL);
00072 }
00073 
00074 const bool InputFileDevice::CloseDevice(void)
00075 {
00076     bool b_Res = true;
00077 
00078     if (m_pfFile != NULL)
00079     {
00080         if (fclose(m_pfFile) != 0)
00081         {
00082             b_Res = false;
00083         }
00084         m_pfFile = NULL;
00085     }
00086 
00087     if (! m_cliOutput.CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00088     {
00089         b_Res = false;
00090     }
00091 
00092     return b_Res;
00093 }
00094 
00095 const KEY InputFileDevice::GetKey(void) const
00096 {
00097     if (m_pfFile != NULL)
00098     {
00099         m_iCurrentLine = m_iNextLine;
00100         m_iCurrentColumn = m_iNextColumn;
00101         char c_Char = NULL_KEY;
00102         if (fread(& c_Char, sizeof(char), 1, m_pfFile) == 1)
00103         {
00104             if (c_Char == '\n')
00105             {
00106                 m_iNextLine ++;
00107                 m_iNextColumn = 1;
00108             }
00109             else
00110             {
00111                 m_iNextColumn ++;
00112             }
00113             return IODevice::GetKey(c_Char);
00114         }
00115     }
00116 
00117     return NULL_KEY;
00118 }
00119 
00120 void InputFileDevice::PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const
00121 {
00122     m_cliOutput.PutString(STR_Out);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void InputFileDevice::Beep(void) const
00126 {
00127     m_cliOutput.Beep();
00128 }
00129 
00130 const tk::String InputFileDevice::GetFileName(void) const
00131 {
00132     return m_strFileName;
00133 }
00134 
00135 const int InputFileDevice::GetCurrentLine(void) const
00136 {
00137     return m_iCurrentLine;
00138 }
00139 
00140 const int InputFileDevice::GetCurrentColumn(void) const
00141 {
00142     return m_iCurrentColumn;
00143 }

00148     m_strFileName(MAX_FILE_PATH_LENGTH, STR_FileName), m_pfFile(NULL)

00150 }

00152 OutputFileDevice::~OutputFileDevice(void)
00153 {
00154 }

00156 const bool OutputFileDevice::OpenDevice(void)
00157 {
00158     if (m_pfFile == NULL)
00159     {
00160         m_pfFile = fopen(m_strFileName, "w");
00161     }
00162 
00163     return (m_pfFile != NULL);
00164 }
00165 
00166 const bool OutputFileDevice::CloseDevice(void)
00167 {
00168     bool b_Res = true;
00169 
00170     if (m_pfFile != NULL)
00171     {
00172         if (fclose(m_pfFile) != 0)
00173         {
00174             b_Res = false;
00175         }
00176         m_pfFile = NULL;
00177     }
00178 
00179     return b_Res;
00180 }
00181 
00182 void OutputFileDevice::PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const
00183 {
00184     if (m_pfFile != NULL)
00185     {
00186         fwrite(STR_Out, sizeof(char), strlen(STR_Out), m_pfFile);
00187     }
00188 }
